channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Home Rescue

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a show celebrating contemporary African lifestyle. The show seeks out the continent's finest design and lifestyle innovation across the spectrum - from interiors and architecture to fashion, arts, food and travel.

channel.desc: Jade, Dan and Monica are three housemates that are obsessed with gaming. Will Whinnie's idea of an industrial neon dream tick their boxes.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Farmhouse Facelift
channel.desc: Billy and Carolyn turn a dilapidated concrete outbuilding on a flower farm into a charming, romantic guesthouse.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Escape To The Country
channel.desc: People seeking to get away from city life ask the experts to help them find their perfect country home.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food
channel.desc: Jamie?s Quick & Easy Food is the ultimate set of go-to recipes that are quick to cook and easy to remember.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Nadiya Bakes
channel.desc: Nadiya shares her favourite biscuits and bites to snack on. First, amaretti biscuits and chicken doughnuts then a colourful tray bakes and finally, chocolate-dipped Florentines.
